fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each day, you must choose one of your abilities. You lose that ability.
- You may use any number of different abilities each night.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player.
- Attack a player.
- Roleblock a player.
- Change your defense to Basic for the night.
- Hide a player's role and will if they die tonight.
- Commit suicide.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
